name: JAGRUT GRAHAK MANDAL, PATAN
briefDescription: Ever since its inception with the registration as a Society and Trust, since. in 1985, our organization has been in the field of Consumer Protection, Investors protection & Education, Empowerment, Health protection, Environment Protection activities extensively and intensively. Our organization enjoys the jurisdiction all over Gujarat state and is the only registered/Recognized by Government of Gujarat and Government of India one in Patan, District.We organize programmes keeping in view the communal unity and social integration, illuminating Human Rights and uphold them with a view to aiming at world peace.We have been allotted since 1989 in Gujarat, A “District Consumer Information Centre” by the Department of Consumer Welfare Fund, M
